description: This table contains information about the providers specific to this episode of care.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: CARE_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The role in the caretaking process that the associated provider is playing, for this episode of care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CARE_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The clinician who is filling the associated role in the caretaking process for this episode.
